text: A Midsummer Night's Dream is a 1935 American fantasy comedy movie directed by Max Reinhardt and William Dieterle and is based on the play of the same name by William Shakespeare. It stars James Cagney, Mickey Rooney, Olivia de Havilland, Jean Muir, Joe E. Brown, Dick Powell, Ross Alexander, Anita Louise, Victor Jory, Ian Hunter and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It won 2 Oscars and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1936. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1935 comedy movies Category:1930s fantasy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Max Reinhardt
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream (1935 movie)
